name: Gift from earth
text: Choose the species import from earth.

conditions: when number of [Diatom] is less than [1]
triggeredUniques: Gain a free [Diatom] [in all cities] <hidden from users>

conditions: when number of [Bony Fishes] is less than [1]
triggeredUniques: +1 Food from Oceanic Aquaculture, -1 Food from Sindrian Lobster
Gain a free [Bony Fishes] [in all cities] <hidden from users>

conditions: when number of [Horse Chestnut] is less than [1]
triggeredUniques: Gain a free [Horse Chestnut] [in all cities] <hidden from users>

conditions: when number of [Stony Coral] is less than [1]
when number of [Oceanic Purifier] is greater than [1]
triggeredUniques: +1 Food from all ocean organics, and +1 Gold from Coast. but requires least 1 Oceanic Purifier
Gain a free [Stony Coral] [in all cities] <hidden from users>

conditions: when number of [Kelp] is less than [1]
triggeredUniques: +1 Food from Algae and Sindrian Lobster, and Plankton. but -1 Food from Seasilk
They will form kelp beds and occupy important role.
Gain a free [Kelp] [in all cities] <hidden from users>

conditions: when number of [Tree Sparrow] is less than [1]
triggeredUniques: +1 Food from Tubers, but -1 Food from Snuffets
Gain a free [Tree Sparrow] [in all cities] <hidden from users>

conditions: when number of [Beaver] is less than [1]
triggeredUniques: Gain a free [Beaver] [in all cities] <hidden from users>

conditions: when number of [Dogs] is less than [1]
triggeredUniques: +3 Happiness in this city, but -1 Food from Land Organics
Gain a free [Dogs] [in all cities] <hidden from users>

conditions: when number of [Diatom] is greater than [0]
when number of [Bony Fishes] is greater than [0]
triggeredUniques: Remove [Bony Fishes] [in all cities] <hidden from users>

conditions: when number of [Horse Chestnut] is greater than [0]
triggeredUniques: Remove [Horse Chestnut] [in all cities] <hidden from users>

conditions: when number of [Stony Coral] is greater than [0]
triggeredUniques: Remove [Stony Coral] [in all cities] <hidden from users>

conditions: when number of [Kelp] is greater than [0]
when number of [Tree Sparrow] is greater than [0]
triggeredUniques: Remove [Tree Sparrow] [in all cities] <hidden from users>

conditions: when number of [Beaver] is greater than [0]
when number of [Dogs] is greater than [0]
